ticket.subject: Cannot log in after password reset
ticket.description: I reset my password yesterday but every time I try to log in with the new credentials I get an "invalid password" error. I have tried clearing cookies and using incognito mode.

ticket.subject: Dashboard charts not rendering
ticket.description: The analytics dashboard loads but all charts appear as blank white boxes. Console shows multiple JavaScript errors related to the charting library.

ticket.subject: Unexpected charge on my invoice
ticket.description: My December invoice includes a $49.99 charge labeled "Premium Add-on" that I never purchased or authorized. Please investigate and issue a refund.

ticket.subject: Request for dark mode support
ticket.description: I spend long hours working in your application and the bright interface causes eye strain. It would be great to have a dark mode toggle in the settings.

ticket.subject: File upload fails for PDFs over 5MB
ticket.description: When I try to upload a PDF larger than 5MB the progress bar reaches 100% but then shows a generic "Upload failed" message. Smaller files work fine.

ticket.subject: Two-factor authentication not sending SMS
ticket.description: I am not receiving the SMS verification code when trying to log in. I have confirmed my phone number is correct and my carrier is not blocking the messages.

ticket.subject: API rate limit exceeded unexpectedly
ticket.description: Our integration started receiving 429 errors this morning even though our request volume has not changed. We are well within the documented rate limits for our plan tier.

ticket.subject: Request to export data in CSV format
ticket.description: Currently the only export option is JSON. For our reporting needs we require CSV export so the data can be opened directly in Excel by our finance team.

ticket.subject: Subscription renewal failed
ticket.description: I received an email saying my subscription renewal failed due to a payment issue, but my credit card is valid and has sufficient funds. The card works on other websites.

ticket.subject: App crashes when switching between tabs
ticket.description: The mobile app crashes consistently when I switch between the Projects tab and the Messages tab. This started after the latest update to version 4.2.1.

ticket.subject: How to add team members to a project
ticket.description: I recently upgraded to the Team plan but I cannot figure out how to invite my colleagues to collaborate on an existing project. The documentation seems outdated.

ticket.subject: Webhook delivery failures
ticket.description: Our webhook endpoint has been returning 200 OK but the system still marks deliveries as failed. We have verified this with request logging on our server.

ticket.subject: Notification emails going to spam
ticket.description: All notification emails from your platform are landing in my Gmail spam folder. I have marked them as not spam multiple times but the problem persists.

ticket.subject: Incorrect timezone in scheduled reports
ticket.description: My account timezone is set to Asia/Shanghai (UTC+8) but scheduled reports are generated using UTC. This causes the daily summary to include data from the wrong date range.

ticket.subject: Account locked after too many login attempts
ticket.description: My account has been locked and I am unable to access it. I believe someone may have been trying to access my account because I did not make those login attempts myself.

ticket.subject: Bulk import tool throws timeout error
ticket.description: When importing a CSV with more than 500 rows the bulk import tool times out after 60 seconds. We need to import approximately 10,000 records for our migration.

ticket.subject: Request for annual billing option
ticket.description: We would like to switch from monthly to annual billing for a discount. Is there an option to pay annually and if so what savings would we receive?

ticket.subject: Search function returns no results
ticket.description: The search bar in the knowledge base returns zero results for any query I enter. Even searching for terms I know exist in articles shows "No results found."

ticket.subject: Add support for SAML SSO
ticket.description: Our organization requires SAML-based single sign-on for all third-party applications. Without SSO support we cannot approve this tool for company-wide use.

ticket.subject: Mobile layout broken on Android
ticket.description: On my Samsung Galaxy S24 running Android 14, the navigation menu overlaps with the main content area making it impossible to tap on any buttons below the header.

ticket.subject: Data discrepancy between dashboard and API
ticket.description: The total count displayed on the web dashboard does not match the count returned by the API endpoint for the same date range. The difference is roughly 15%.

ticket.subject: Cannot downgrade subscription plan
ticket.description: I am trying to downgrade from the Enterprise plan to the Pro plan but the "Change Plan" button is grayed out. There is no error message explaining why.

ticket.subject: Keyboard shortcuts not working
ticket.description: None of the documented keyboard shortcuts work in the text editor. I have tested on both Chrome and Firefox with all extensions disabled.

ticket.subject: Need help transferring account ownership
ticket.description: I am leaving the company and need to transfer ownership of our organization account to my colleague. What documentation or verification do you need to process this?

ticket.subject: Slow page load times
ticket.description: Pages are taking 15 to 20 seconds to load over the past week. My internet connection is fine and other websites load normally. This affects every page in the application.

ticket.subject: Feature request: multi-language support
ticket.description: Our team is based across France, Germany, and Spain. It would be very helpful if the interface supported French, German, and Spanish in addition to English.

ticket.subject: Invoice PDF download returns blank page
ticket.description: When I click "Download PDF" on any invoice from the billing history the downloaded file opens as a completely blank page. The file size is only 1KB which seems too small.

ticket.subject: OAuth token refresh not working
ticket.description: Our OAuth integration stopped refreshing access tokens automatically. The refresh token endpoint returns a 400 error with the message "invalid_grant" even though the refresh token has not expired.

ticket.subject: Accessibility issues with screen reader
ticket.description: Several buttons and form fields are missing ARIA labels, making it very difficult to navigate the application using NVDA screen reader on Windows.

ticket.subject: Duplicate email notifications
ticket.description: I am receiving two identical email notifications for every event. I have checked my notification preferences and only one email address is listed with notifications enabled once.
